title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 42 - Shellfish Control - Express Terms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 42 - Shellfish Control - Express Terms

State Regulations
§ 42.1 - Purpose
§ 42.2 - Definitions
§ 42.3 - Applicability; general prohibitions
§ 42.4 - Applications for permits; permit description; permit fees
§ 42.5 - Shellfish Dealer Education
§ 42.6 - Conditions of a permit
§ 42.7 - License or permit modifications, suspensions, and revocations
§ 42.8 - Recordkeeping requirements
§ 42.9 - Facilities, buildings, structures and surrounding grounds
§ 42.10 - Safety of water and ice
§ 42.11 - Plumbing, sinks, sewage, wastewater, toilets and toilet rooms
§ 42.12 - Receiving, packing, repacking, and processing shellfish
§ 42.13 - Storage of shellfish
§ 42.14 - Shellfish harvesting, identification and handling by harvesters
§ 42.15 - Conveyances used for the transportation of shellfish
§ 42.16 - Shellfish hazardous for use as food for human consumption
§ 42.17 - Examination and condemnation of shellfish
§ 42.18 - Confidentiality of fisheries data
§ 42.19 - Penalties

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 42

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, arts. 11, 13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
